content.rendered:
CHAIRMAN MESSAGE

IIA Rajasthan Chapter

CHAIRMAN OF IIA RAJASTHAN CHAPTER

AR. TUSHAR SOGANI

_______

Greetings

It gives me immense pleasure to extend a warm welcome to The Indian Institute of Architects, Rajasthan Chapter and its Website.

I am honoured to commence my message as the new Chairman of the IIA, Rajasthan Chapter, thanking everyone who voted and supported me and my team in the recent Committee Election. This Committee has a strong determination to uphold a “Members come first” agenda, and Members’ voices and opinions are valuable to us.

The IIA Rajasthan Chapter pledges to play a role in sharing technical information and experiences, as well as providing chances for specialists to improve their professional competence through contributions to and from the fraternity. 

In the closing I would like to request all professionals (practising, teaching, technical, experts) and students to strengthen the IIA, Rajasthan Chapter.

Ar. Tushar Sogani
Chairman 2020-2022
IIA, Rajasthan Chapter
